heading: HB06479
0: AN ACT INCREASING THE BED CAPACITY OF OSPITAL NG PALAWAN IN THE CITY OF PUERTO PRINCESA, PROVINCE OF PALAWAN FROM ONE HUNDRED (100) BEDS TO FOUR HUNDRED (400) BEDS, UPGRADING THE SERVICE FACILITIES AND PROFESSIONAL HEALTH CARE THEREIN, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
